name: SciQ
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Tune in for short updates on what is happening in the US and the world this week as Jayde Lovell, host of SciQ, unpacks the science and wades through the data so you don't have to!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
